code: import{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Shop(){const navigate=useNavigate();const[items]=useState(["Phone","Laptop","Headphones"]);const[cart,setCart]=useState([]);const add=item=>{setCart([...cart,item]);};const checkout=async()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");await fetch("https://rrr-shopkart-backend.onrender.com/api/save-order/",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:JSON.stringify({items:cart.join(", "),total:cart.length*1000})});navigate("/success");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Shop"}),items.map(i=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>add(i),children:["Add ",i]},i)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Cart: ",cart.join(", ")]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:checkout,children:"Checkout"})]});}export default Shop;
